data.eml:eml: Taxonomic redefinition and natural history of the endemic silphid beetle Silpha longicornis (Coleoptera: Silphidae) of Japan, with an analysis of its geographic variation

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nishikawa, Masaaki, Ikeda, Hiroshi, Kubota, Kohei, Sota, Teiji (2010): Taxonomic redefinition and natural history of the endemic silphid beetle Silpha longicornis (Coleoptera: Silphidae) of Japan, with an analysis of its geographic variation. Zootaxa 2648: 1-31, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.198718
